Description: Collection of R packages (tidyr, dplyr, ggplot2) designed for data science that works harmoniously with other packages
Changing the layout of the data sets, to convert data into a tidy format
For data Pre-Processing and Feature Selection
For data manipulation that can be reducing programming and compute time tremendously
